name: projeto-final-js-ninja
description: Conclusion project of course Javascirpt Ninja.

scripts.uglify: uglifyjs --output js/min/main.min.js --compress --mangle -- js/main.js && uglifyjs --output js/min/dom.min.js --compress --mangle -- js/dom.js
scripts.message: echo App is running on http://localhost:8080 && echo Press CTRL + C to close the application
